title: Unsupervised Multiplex Graph Learning with Complementary and Consistent Information. (arXiv:2308.01606v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Unsupervised multiplex graph learning (UMGL) has been shown to achieve significant effectiveness for different downstream tasks by exploring both complementary information and consistent information among multiple graphs. However, previous methods usually overlook the issues in practical applications, i.e., the out-of-sample issue and the noise issue. To address the above issues, in this paper, we propose an effective and efficient UMGL method to explore both complementary and consistent information. To do this, our method employs multiple MLP encoders rather than graph convolutional network (GCN) to conduct representation learning with two constraints, i.e., preserving the local graph structure among nodes to handle the out-of-sample issue, and maximizing the correlation of multiple node representations to handle the noise issue. Comprehensive experiments demonstrate that our proposed method achieves superior effectiveness and efficiency over the comparison methods and effectively tac

Title: Unsupervised Multiplex Graph Learning with Complementary and Consistent Information. (arXiv:2308.01606v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: Unsupervised multiplex graph learning (UMGL) has been shown to achieve significant effectiveness for different downstream tasks by exploring both complementary information and consistent information among multiple graphs. However, previous methods usually overlook the issues in practical applications, i.e., the out-of-sample issue and the noise issue. To address the above issues, in this paper, we propose an effective and efficient UMGL method to explore both complementary and consistent information. To do this, our method employs multiple MLP encoders rather than graph convolutional network (GCN) to conduct representation learning with two constraints, i.e., preserving the local graph structure among nodes to handle the out-of-sample issue, and maximizing the correlation of multiple node representations to handle the noise issue. Comprehensive experiments demonstrate that our proposed method achieves superior effectiveness and efficiency over the comparison methods and effectively tac
translated_title: 无监督的多重复合图学习方法，并结合互补和一致的信息
translated_abstract: 通过探索多个图之间的互补信息和一致信息，无监督的多重复合图学习方法（UMGL）已被证明在不同的下游任务中取得了显著的效果。然而，先前的方法通常忽视了实际应用中的问题，即样本外问题和噪声问题。为了解决上述问题，在本文中，我们提出了一种有效且高效的UMGL方法来探索互补和一致的信息。为此，我们的方法采用了多个MLP编码器而不是图卷积网络（GCN）来进行表示学习，同时具有两个约束条件：保留节点之间的局部图结构以处理样本外问题，并最大化多个节点表示之间的相关性以处理噪声问题。全面的实验证明，我们提出的方法在效果和效率上优于比较方法，并且能够有效地处理噪声。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种无监督的多重复合图学习方法，通过探索多个图之间的互补信息和一致信息来解决下游任务，同时解决了样本外问题和噪声问题。实验证明该方法在效果和效率上均优于其他方法。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an unsupervised multiplex graph learning method that explores complementary and consistent information among multiple graphs, solving downstream tasks and addressing out-of-sample and noise issues. Extensive experiments demonstrate its superior effectiveness and efficiency over other methods.
